body.raw:
# Drawer The Drawer component is a sliding panel from the screen's edge, useful for tasks or viewing details without leaving the current page. ## Installation ## Import - **DrawerRoot**: All parts of the drawer are included. - **DrawerTrigger**: Used to activate or open the Drawer component. - **DrawerPortal**: Portal the overlay and content portion into the body. - **DrawerBackdrop**: A layer that covers the inactive portion of the view when a dialog box is opened. - **DrawerContent**: Includes the content that will be displayed in the open dialog box. - **DrawerClose**: The button that closes the dialog. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { Drawer } from '@melio-ui/drawer'; Title ); } render(); function Title(props) { const { children } = props; return (
{children}
); } function CloseButton(props) { return ( ); } ``` ### Custom Size ```jsx ``` ### Prevent closing when clicking on the backdrop. ```jsx ```
